sentence.Network_en: The home - made statuary gave an artistic air to the room.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些 自制 的雕像给房间增添了艺术气息.

sentence.Network_en: Rodin's Old Streetwalker is a rare work in statuary history.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗丹的《老娼妓》是雕塑史上一件不可多得的杰作.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin statuarius, from statua (see statue)

entry.def: If you talk about the statuary in a place, you are referring to all the statues and sculpture there.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or suitable for statues

auth_sentence.content: The shopping floor is appointed with terra cotta planters and stone statuary; classes have ranged from home-brewing to bonsai.

auth_sentence.content: "Life, it was tough," Mr. Lam said in a recent interview in his gold-bedecked office, decorated with golden pillars and statuary.
